price: They said, “Shall we follow a single human being[9] from among us? Then we would surely be in error and insanity!
arabic: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَبَشَرٗا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدٗا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّفِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٍ
